xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
/$
$
OUR STORY
/$
$
Horse & Hounds Restaurant is more than just a place to eat – it's a local Ocala institution! We've been serving up delicious American comfort food and friendly hospitality for over 20 years. As a family-owned and operated restaurant, we take pride in creating a warm and inviting atmosphere where everyone feels welcome.
​
Whether you're a longtime local or just passing through, we invite you to relax and unwind in our charming, estate-like home setting. We offer a variety of options to suit your mood, from our cozy pub area to our beautiful patio seating.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
/$
$
/$
$
$
$
"Here in Ocala we may not be quite ready for true fine dining, but we're close," Landry says. "Horse and Hounds has a good name, and we're hoping to bring that good name to this side, bring that special occasion dining to upstairs."
/$
$
WENDELL LANDRY, OWNER
/$
/$
$
Sourced from Ocala Star Banner
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
